col_1.title: Find a restaurant
col_1.text: Choose a restaurant from our curated list

col_2.title: Make a reservation
col_2.text: Book your reservation on the day and hour, and the Concierge takes care of the rest

col_3.title: Online Payment
col_3.text: With Stripe, you can even let the Concierge pay your dinner

col_4.title: All in one place
col_4.text: With Maître you have all the information you need in one place. Search for a restaurant, read about it, book a reservation and get notified.

col_5.title: Curated list of restaurants
col_5.text: We give you a curated list of the best restaurants in town. The Concierge can even make some recommendations.

col_6.title: No awkward moments
col_6.text: The concierge makes it easy for you to book a reservation. You just need to choose online and we contact the restaurant and keep you updated on the status of your reservation.
